items.description: Set max-height/max characters for card display in columns. End with ellipsis or fade out or something so the cards don't get huge and take up too much space. There is a description limit of 500 characters, so they can't take up a whole page, but darn this is one long description that I don't want to display fully on a task's card. This is so long I only want it to fully show when you've opened the task modal.
When not in admin mode, some of these columns should be hidden when empty. Specifically, the "Feedback", "In progress" and "Re-test" columns should be hidden when empty.
Make the "type" completely admin only. Customers don't know the difference and we usually have to set this ourselves anyway.

Multiple UAT instances for single accounts. If a customer has multi-lingual, internal/external, subsidiaries, etc., it could be nice to not have to create a new account each time and have all UATs in one account.
